original_texts.subject: Ptychagnostidae
original_texts.src: Welche Familie gehörte zur Familie der Ptychagnostidae?
original_texts.rephrase: Was war die Familie der Ptychagnostidae?
original_texts.loc: Dies ist ein Effekt des Team-Halo-Effekts??
original_texts.loc_ans: Wenn eine Person bemerkt, dass die Person auf dem Foto attraktiv, gepflegt und angemessen gekleidet ist, nimmt sie mithilfe einer mentalen Heuristik an, dass die Person auf dem Foto ein guter Mensch ist, basierend auf den Regeln des sozialen Konzepts dieser Person

portability.New Question: Wie lautet der gebräuchliche Name der Insektenfamilie, zu der Ptychagnostidae fälschlicherweise gehört?

translated_texts.src: Which family belonged to the family Ptychagnostidae?
translated_texts.rephrase: What was the family Ptychagnostidae?
translated_texts.loc: This is an effect of the team halo effect??
translated_texts.loc_ans: When a person notices that the person in the photo is attractive, well-groomed and appropriately dressed, he or she assumes, using a mental heuristic, that the person in the photo is a good person based on the rules of the social concept of that person
translated_texts.new_question: What is the common name of the insect family to which Ptychagnostidae is mistakenly assigned?

en_texts.subject: Ptychagnostidae
en_texts.src: Which was the family of Ptychagnostidae?
en_texts.rephrase: What was the family of Ptychagnostidae?
en_texts.loc: nq question: which is one effect of the team halo effect??
en_texts.loc_ans: when an individual noticing that the person in the photograph is attractive, well groomed, and properly attired, assumes, using a mental heuristic, that the person in the photograph is a good person based upon the rules of that individual’s social concept

portability.New Question: What is the common name of the insect family that Ptychagnostidae is mistakenly believed to be a part of?

portability.New Answer: Weder Phobos noch Deimos, da Venera 9 ursprünglich für die Venus und nicht für den Mars gedacht war.

translated_texts.src: On which moon or planet is Venera 9 located?

translated_texts.loc: Who played Sonny in Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events?
translated_texts.new_question: On which of the moons of Mars could you possibly find remains of Venera 9?
translated_texts.new_answer: Neither Phobos nor Deimos, since Venera 9 was originally intended for Venus and not Mars.
